segments.text: Do you often go to watch sports games ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I go occasionally when there's a game on near home , but usually I watch it on TV .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sometimes . But I'll never forget the game in which our Chinese Women's Volleyball Team won the World Cup . It is the most thrilling and exciting game I have ever seen .
segments.speaker: S2
